attributes.action: Stop building more houses in Castleford and taking away our wildlifes home
attributes.additional_details: I run a hedgehog rescue in castleford and we are getting in alot of hedgehogs around new builds in Castleford and now the government is wanting to build MORE eventhough they have already built thousands in Castleford. It's killing our wildlife!!
attributes.background: the government is wanting to build MORE houses and taking away our wildlifes homes! This needs to Stop!

rejection.details:
Local planning decisions are usually the responsibility of your local council.

The Government has designated a Housing Zone in Castleford. That means that the local council with work in partnership with private developers to build more homes, with the help of Government funding. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask the Government to withdraw this funding, or to change the location of the Housing Zone.
